name: Holded
slogan: The first cloud application to run the 100% of a business
description:
Holded is a Management Software for SMEswith applications from invoicing and accounting to HR, CRM, project management and a range of integrations that allows Holded to connect with banks, ecommerce platforms and marketplaces such as Shopify and Amazon.

The platform automates many administrative tasks, for example, it generates 95% of the accounting inputs of a company automatically, through invoices issued and automatic synchronisation with banks.

Founded in 2016, Holded has received funding from Nauta Capital, several seed funds and Business Angels.

jobs.title: Brand & PR Manager
jobs.description: As a Brand Manager at Holded you will be our online and offline voice to the world. You will manage the company’s brand front-line communication efforts, both in Spanish and English, including brand strategy, content creation, PR and social communication.​ You will have to make sure that all aspects of the company communicate the same message and every action is consistent to the core values of Holded as a Brand.

jobs.title: Business Development Manager
jobs.description:
As a Business Development Manager you will be a key player in our Sales team. You will collaborate in managing and optimizing the sales funnel, validating leads, making demos to our clients, engaging them and helping the potential clients to get to know and contract Holded as the software for their company.

With you joining us, we’d accomplish two of our main goals – help our product reach more and more people globally, and bring more value to those who’re already using it.

jobs.title: Customer Success Specialist
jobs.description:
Are you a detail-oriented, self-motivated person who enjoy helping others? You have experience as an Accountant? Moreover, you are usually the go to person and people describe you as friendly and resourceful? Join a fast-growing company with a team of good and talented people who have come together in Barcelona to reinvent the concept of ERP.

As a Customer Success Specialist for the Spanish speaking markets you will be in charge of the user onboarding, retention and support. You will be in charge to help users with the onboard, and give them support while they learn on how to use the product and solve any accounting related questions that they might have. You will also help on building Holded Academy, a key tool for the department to automate as much as possible the user support.

With joining us, you will work in one of the most important areas in the company. As a self service product the CS strategy has a huge impact on how the users onboard the product and bringing more value to our users.

jobs.title: Product Owner
jobs.description:
Are you a highly-motivated individual with a genuine interest in technology and passion to deliver cutting-edge features and functionalities? Are you ready to lead a product with sustained period of growth thinking globally and adding quick value to the rest of the business? Join a fast-growing company with a team of good and talented people who have come together in Barcelona to reinvent the concept of ERP.

As a Product Owner you will develop the product vision by working closely with C-level and stakeholders and transmit it to our skilled engineering team. 

Your main responsibilities will be: 

- Create and execute the vision for the product bringing together multi-disciplinary talented teams to deliver commercially viable and compelling products.
- Overseeing team project removing blockers, ensuring project scope and setting accurate timelines and deadlines.
- Create or review product ideas and feedback to evaluate the inclusion in product backlog.
- Engage extensively with customers (either directly or through the customer service team) in order to gain first-hand knowledge of consumer and market feedback to develop valuable insights.
- Anticipate future product lines by keeping track of industry trends.
- Own and be accountable for the product development.
- Provide strategic and hands-on leadership to a strong multidisciplinary team.
- Prioritize the backlog and set the roadmap.

jobs.title: QA Lead
jobs.description:
Are you a Senior QA professional willing to create and lead an awesome QA team? Do you have the ability to define problems, collect data, establish facts and procedures, draw valid conclusions and provide solutions? Do you particularly enjoy working with amazing people, having fun at work and building something awesome? If so, let’s talk! Join a fast-growing company with a team of good and talented people who have come together in Barcelona to reinvent the concept of ERP.

As a QA Lead you will be responsible of building the QA department from scratch, establishing all the methodologies and procedures that better fits our team. You will also define and create the tests, providing  mentoring to the team. Ensure end user needs are met with consistently high quality and update team on progress toward resolution while creating walk throughs documentation of each client issue/resolution.

jobs.title: SEO Manager

jobs.title: Sales Specialist
jobs.description:
You want to join a quickly growing startup and actively drive its growth? Moreover, you love sales and engage potential clients? Join a fast-growing company with a team of good and talented people who have come together in Barcelona to reinvent the concept of ERP.

As a Sales Specialist you will be a key player in our Sales team. Your main goal will be booking demos for potential clients. You will call the leads who have sent the request and signed up to our platform, validate them, qualify them and convince them to request a demo with one of our BDM.

Knowledge in Spanish accounting and finance system is a must.

jobs.title: Senior Fullstack Developer
jobs.description:
As a Fullstack Developer you will take a key role on our team and must have knowledge in all stages of software development.

You will be working alongside other engineers and developers, collaborating on the various layers of the infrastructure for our software.

We’re not looking for stack experts. We’re looking for smart people who can bring in the best tools and processes to get the job done.

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer
jobs.description:
Do you live and breathe turning problems into simple and engaging customer experiences for web, tablet and mobile? Do you enjoy developing information architecture, interaction models schematics and customer flows for products and services? Join a fast-growing company with a team of good and talented people who have come together in Barcelona to reinvent the concept of ERP.

As a UX /UI Designer at Holded you will be designing the UI of the applications in web, tablet and mobile, also you will design the landing pages. All our designs are done hand in hand with the Product Department to reach a high detailed quality. We are focused on designing in an efficient way to be able to automate and being agile and effective when making changes.
